name: RulesofMMA
0:
”Alexa ask rules of m.m.a. for a rule”
”Alexa ask rules of m.m.a. for an mma rule”
”Alexa tell rules of m.m.a. to tell me an mma rule”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rules of m. m. a.
des:
Ask for the Rules of MMA, and learn about the rules of mma according to the unified rules and other mma regulations as used in the UFC .

Currently contains only the rules regarding judging in mma.

To start, just say "Alexa, ask Rules of M. M. A. for a rule" or "Alexa, ask Rules of M. M. A. to tell me an mma rule" to get a rule.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
